bill.title: Recognizing the importance labor unions play in ensuring a strong middle class by advocating for more equitable wages, humane work conditions, improved benefits, and increased civic engagement by everyday workers.
bill.description: Recognizes the importance labor unions play in ensuring a strong middle class by advocating for more equitable wages, humane working conditions, improved benefits, and increased civic engagement by everyday workers.

history.action: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H7217-7218)
